typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		casenumber as string,
		intekst as string,
		datediscovered as string,
		type as string,
		inteksttxt as string,
		id as integer,
		reporttypename as string,
		occorattempt as string,
		projectnum as string,
		duedate as string,
		departament as string,
		description as string,
		typehendelse as string,
		lukkedato as string,
		timeforbruk as double,
		tidkost as integer,
		totalsum as integer,
		statustxt as string,
		categoryname as string,
		caseprocessorname as string,
		regbyname as string,
		regbycompanyname as string,
		regtocompanyname as string,
		subject as string,
		conqlusion as string,
		utfallname as string,
		causename as string,
		managementcausename as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		casenumber as string,
		intekst as string,
		datediscovered as string,
		type as string,
		inteksttxt as string,
		id as integer,
		reporttypename as string,
		occorattempt as string,
		projectnum as string,
		duedate as string,
		departament as string,
		description as string,
		typehendelse as string,
		lukkedato as string,
		timeforbruk as double,
		tidkost as integer,
		totalsum as string,
		statustxt as string,
		categoryname as string,
		caseprocessorname as string,
		regbyname as string,
		regbycompanyname as string,
		regtocompanyname as string,
		subject as string,
		conqlusion as string,
		utfallname as string,
		causename as string,
		managementcausename as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE IP_Årsaker'],
	postSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE IP_Årsaker_test'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkNewData
